## <img src="https://emojis.slackmojis.com/emojis/images/1701286610/78173/meowdyq.gif?1701286610" height="24px"> &nbsp;Howdy!

I'm **Rdr. Seraphim Pardee**, an ‚ò¶Ô∏è Orthodox Christian reader and üë®üèª‚Äçüíª software engineer from &nbsp;<img src="https://emojis.slackmojis.com/emojis/images/1643514819/8346/michigan-hi-5.png?1643514819" height="16" />&nbsp; **Grand Blanc, MI**. Professionally, I'm helping unleash the full potential of pharmacy at &nbsp;<img src="https://iarx.com/wp-content/uploads/iarx-logo-purple-150x150.png" height="16" />&nbsp; **<a href="https://iarx.com">iA</a>**. In my free time, I'm bringing Scripture from your Discord client to your heart with &nbsp;<img src="https://biblebot.xyz/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/02/cropped-logo-dc-crop-fix-transparent-192x192.png" height="16" />&nbsp; **<a href="https://biblebot.xyz">BibleBot</a>**, through my non-profit &nbsp;<img src="https://kerygma.digital/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/cropped-icon_512x-32x32.png" height="20">&nbsp; **<a href="https://kerygma.digital">Kerygma Digital</a>**, and contributing to various open-source endeavors.
